Name: Aranda Shirt Crusader Edition Purple/Ivory
Description:
Fiore makes it easy to be fashionable with the Aranda. This unique top combines a dress shirt and waistcoat styled in complementary colors. The shirt comes with short sleeves cuffed at the elbows while the waistcoat features a small geometric flourish on the front pockets that's mirrored across the back. 

The Crusader Edition was made specifically for employees of Crusader Industries.
